# Magic Weapon, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Melee or ranged weapons held by allied creatures in a 20-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless, object)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless, object)

**Source:** Magic of Eberron (Wotc), pg. 99

This spell functions like *[[Magic Weapon (Spell)|magic weapon]]*, except as noted above and as follows. It affects only weapons held by allies when the spell is cast. It has no effect on ammunition.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Name changed from *legion's magic weapon* to *mass magic weapon* for campaign continuity.
